description: This test validates the Sant Venant - Kirchoff orthotropic material model (num 151). The test consist of an anisotropic layered plate 90/45 under tensile loading. The cross section is not balanced neither symmetric, so the response includes shear-extension and bend-twist couplings. The example verifies simple laminated composite plate analysis by using material coordinate system.
name: sm151_anisoPlate
